snippet: As a therapy center employee, Sharon Chisholm says, she performed procedures she was not trained to do, submitted false insurance claims and watched patients receive unnecessary treatments.   As a whistle-blower, Ms. Chisholm has joined the United...
lead_paragraph: As a therapy center employee, Sharon Chisholm says, she performed procedures she was not trained to do, submitted false insurance claims and watched patients receive unnecessary treatments. As a whistle-blower, Ms. Chisholm has joined the United States Attorney's office here in filing a lawsuit maintaining that Dr. Gerald Lawrence Wolfe and his wife, Maureen Foohey Wolfe, cheated the Government out of $2.7 million provided by Medicare and Medi-Cal, the state's Medicaid program.

headline.main: Whistle-Blower Suit Says Doctor Bilked Government of Millions
